name: Michael Jaison Gnanasekar
body:
### Objective
Seeking an internship offer for summer 2016 that resonates with my field of study - Computer Vision. I intend to learn and address complex real world vision problems.
Area of interest: Scene understanding, Object recognition, Feature tracking.

### Education
Masters in Computer Vision, Robotics Institute, Carnegie Mellon University
Graduation year: Fall 2016

[LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mjaison)
[Resume](https://github.com/gmichaeljaison/gmichaeljaison.github.io/raw/master/Resume.pdf)
